com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.layouts

Class BasicGridLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.markussecundus.forms.extensibility.IExtensible
      • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.BasicAbstractDrawableElem<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
        • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.layouts.BasicAbstractLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
          • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.layouts.BasicGridLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
  • Type Parameters:
    Rend - The renderer type that performs the drawing of the element to the screen or anywhere else
    Pos - Vector type used to define the position and dimensions of the element
    Scalar - The type that Pos's individual components consist of (- see VectUtil )
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>, Element, UberDrawable<Rend,Pos>, UberElement, Extensible, Drawable<Rend,Pos>

    public class BasicGridLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
extends BasicAbstractLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
    Basic layout for arranging Elements in a grid.
    Author:
    MarkusSecundus
    See Also:
    BasicAbstractLayout, BasicLinearLayout

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicGridLayout

        public BasicGridLayout(VectUtil<Pos,Scalar> posUtil)
        Inits the layout with default values.

        defaultCellAllignment: [0,... ,0]

        defaultElementCoords: [0,... ,0]

        defaultCellSize: posUtil.ZERO()

        maxSize: posUtil.MAX_VAL()

        minSize: posUtil.ZERO()

        prefSize: posUtil.MAX_VAL()

        Parameters:
        posUtil - VectUtil for the used vector type

      • BasicGridLayout

        public BasicGridLayout(Pos maxSize,
                       Pos minSize,
                       Pos prefSize,
                       VectUtil<Pos,Scalar> posUtil)
        Inits the layout with default values.

        defaultCellAllignment: [0,... ,0]

        defaultElementCoords: [0,... ,0]

        defaultCellSize: posUtil.ZERO()

        Parameters:
        maxSize - initial value for layout's max size
        minSize - initial value for layout's min size
        prefSize - initial value for layout's preffered size
        posUtil - VectUtil for the used vector type

      • BasicGridLayout

        public BasicGridLayout(Pos maxSize,
                       Pos minSize,
                       Pos prefSize,
                       VectUtil<Pos,Scalar> posUtil,
                       Pos defaultCellSize)
        Inits the layout with default values.

        defaultCellAllignment: [0,..,,0]

        defaultElementCoords: [0,..,,0]

        Parameters:
        maxSize - initial value for layout's max size
        minSize - initial value for layout's min size
        prefSize - initial value for layout's preffered size
        posUtil - VectUtil for the used vector type
        defaultCellSize - initial value for defaultCellSize property

      • BasicGridLayout

        public BasicGridLayout(Pos maxSize,
                       Pos minSize,
                       Pos prefSize,
                       VectUtil<Pos,Scalar> posUtil,
                       Pos defaultCellSize,
                       ReadonlyList.Double defaultCellAllignment,
                       ReadonlyList.Int defaultElementCoords)
        Inits the layout.
        Parameters:
        maxSize - initial value for layout's max size
        minSize - initial value for layout's min size
        prefSize - initial value for layout's preffered size
        posUtil - VectUtil for the used vector type
        defaultCellSize - initial value for defaultCellSize property
        defaultCellAllignment - initial value for defaultCellAllignment property
        defaultElementCoords - coordinates where every drawable child with no position specified will be drawn

      • addDrawableChild

        public void addDrawableChild(DrawableElem<Rend,Pos> drw,
                             int... positionOnGrid)
        Adds a drawable child and sets its position on the grid to the specified value in one convenient and easy to read function call.
        Parameters:
        drw - DrawableElem to be added as child
        positionOnGrid - coordinates of the cell where the child is to be added

      • childPosition

        public ReadonlyProperty<Pos> childPosition(DrawableElem<Rend,Pos> child)
                                    throws BasicAbstractLayout.LayoutTooShortException
        Description copied from interface: UberDrawable
        Returns the position of child relative to the parent (this). Can return null if child isn't really the child of this.
        Specified by:
        childPosition in interface UberDrawable<Rend,Pos>
        Overrides:
        childPosition in class BasicAbstractLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
        Parameters:
        child - the child of this whose position is being obtained
        Throws:
        BasicAbstractLayout.LayoutTooShortException

      • ignoreTooShort

        public Property<java.lang.Boolean> ignoreTooShort()
        Decides whether the BasicAbstractLayout.LayoutTooShortException is thrown at the end of child positions recompute if the children don't fit into the layout, or if it is ignored.
